name: Classic Butter Biscuits
description: Our signature buttery biscuits made with premium ingredients. Perfect with tea or coffee.

name: Chocolate Chip Delights
description: Crispy biscuits loaded with premium dark chocolate chips. A crowd favorite!

name: Savory Herb Crackers
description: Light and crispy crackers infused with fresh herbs. Perfect for cheese platters.

name: Honey Oat Biscuits
description: Wholesome oat biscuits sweetened with pure honey. Healthy and delicious.

name: Cheese & Chive Biscuits
description: Flaky biscuits with aged cheddar cheese and fresh chives. Perfect for brunch.

name: Gingerbread Cookies
description: Traditional gingerbread cookies with warming spices. A holiday favorite all year round.

name: Rosemary Sea Salt Crackers
description: Artisanal crackers with fresh rosemary and sea salt. Pairs perfectly with wine.

name: Lemon Shortbread
description: Delicate shortbread cookies with bright lemon zest. Light and refreshing.

name: Almond Biscotti
description: Traditional Italian twice-baked biscuits with toasted almonds. Perfect with coffee.

name: Cinnamon Sugar Cookies
description: Soft cookies rolled in cinnamon sugar. A comforting classic that never goes out of style.
